title: Geopolitical consequences of Covid-19 - Discussion with Klisman Murati of Pangea Wire Group
content: In this episode, our Head of Trade and Transaction Banking, Alex Gray, talks to Klisman Murati of Pangea Wire Group. They discuss the long term knock-on effects of the virus, its impact on all types of supply chains and consumer behaviour throughout the industry.

title: The benefits of long-term thinking (With Klisman Murati)
content: The podcast that covers everything insurance. In this episode Peter is joined by Klisman Murati, Founder & CEO -of Pareto Economics, we discuss the benefits of long term thinking on a global scale.
